item.description:
This is one of the best parties and wine tastings of the year outside on one of the longest days of the year. I rarely miss it. Purchase your $45.00 ticket now to reserve your evening.

There is Summer Solstice: the date in late June marking the first official day of summer and the years longest day of sun light. And there is Summer Solstice: the much anticipated annual Boston Uncorked roof deck wine soiree. Each celebrate the other.

Join Boston Uncorked for a sun and fun filled evening of fine wine, food and music at the Summer Solstice 7th Annual Roof Deck Wine Tasting at The Sports Club LA Roof Deck on Tuesday, June 28 from 6:45pm to 9pm. Sample over 25 fine wines from producers all across the globe, paired with delectable bites while enjoying live jazz performed by Florencia Gonzales atop one of the city's hottest roof deck venues.

Check In is 6:45pm. Event moves indoors if inclement weather. One must attend to experience. For more information about the event please go to www.bostonuncorked.com. Yes RSVPs who have not purchased tickets to the event will be changed to no. Arrive early and take the MBTA if you can. 

To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.com . Please do not call or contact the Sports Club LA.

A bunch of members from the red sox natives meetup will be joining us.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Yes RSVPs who have purchased tickets will be E Mailed the day before the event..
item.name: Boston Uncorked Summer Solstice 7th Annual Roof Deck Wine Tasting Sports Club LA
